text: Racers () is a 1972 Soviet drama movie directed by Igor Maslennikov.ГОНЩИКИ (1972)ГОНЩИКИ It stars Yevgeny Leonov, Oleg Yankovsky, and Georgiy Burkov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Igor Maslennikov
title: Racers (movie)
